input: sentence: Sam and Pete are going to the conference. word: and

complianceText:
The chatbot's output provides the part of speech tag "CC" along with a brief description "(Coordinating conjunction)" for the word. The description specifically requires returning "just the tag" for the word's part of speech. Including a description alongside the tag violates this requirement.
